_metadata.description: Scorecard alert rules for threshold breaches and signal events

rules.name: Composite Below Concern Threshold
rules.action: Notify risk owner + trigger Pack 01 re-assessment

rules.name: Composite Below Critical Threshold
rules.action: Escalate to CISO. Activate contingency planning.

rules.name: Category Below Threshold
rules.action: Investigate category root cause. Notify vendor.

rules.name: Rapid Decline Detected
rules.action: Trigger out-of-cycle re-assessment. Present trajectory to risk owner.

rules.name: Breach Database Hit
rules.condition: vendor domain in breach database (new entry)
rules.action: Immediate vendor contact. Activate Pack 05 if data affected.
